title: Panama Canal Symbolizes U.S. Geopolitical, Technological Power
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Harvard professor Noel Maurer about the Panama Canal which opened 100 years ago. One of the Seven Wonders of the Modern World, it connected the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
